description:
An ultralight, compact inflatable SUP for lakes, mellow flat water and fitness paddling. Packs into a backpack for easy transport and storage in tight spaces. Perfect for an early-morning paddle before work or hike-in adventures to secret lakes.

  • Dual layer, drop stitch construction provides long-term durability at an incredibly light weight
  • Rockered nose improves the ride over chop
  • 5.9in. thick for excellent stiffness
  • Deflates to store in the included backpack
  • Deck bungee cord gives you a place to lash your water bottle or small dry bag
  • Carry handle makes it easy to haul up from the water
  • Includes a 3-piece aluminum paddle with leash, high-pressure pump, carrying backpack, stabilizer fin and repair kit with valve handle
name: Level Six Ten Six Ultralight Inflatable SUP Package - Unisex
